text: itance - Bulbous nose - Constipation - Cryptorchidism - Downturned corners of mouth - Ectodermal dysplasia - High, narrow palate - Hypoplastic lacrimal duct - Hypotrichosis - Intellectual disability - Preauricular pit - Sacral dimple - Tetraamelia - Umbilical hernia - Upslanted palpebral fissure - Wide mouth - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
